definition: lit. rat in a country shrine, fox on town walls; fig. unprincipled thugs who abuse others' power to bully and exploit people
society/group/club/agency/(old) god of the land

to make endless exorbitant demands

to wipe out dissenters/to exterminate those who disagree
to usurp/to steal
cow and famous steed at the same trough (idiom); fig. the common and the great are treated alike
knife, saw, ax and hatchet (idiom); facing torture and execution
to live in luxury/lit. to ride a solid carriage pulled by fat horses
to cling to the rich and powerful (idiom); to advance one's career by currying favor/social climbing

lit. to have only nine meals in thirty days (idiom)/fig. (of a family) on the brink of starvation/in dire straits
lit. almanac from years back (idiom)/obsolete practice/old-fashioned principle
traitor minister and corrupt official (idiom); abuse and corruption
